tool.name: reorderient
tool.description: : Perform local rearrangment between scaffold ordered based on the UPGMA

param.name: mat
param.label: The data matrix with pair-wise statistics between markers

param.name: type
param.label: The type of data. IDENT for identity statistics (ex LOD), DIF for difference statistics (ex REC)

param.name: iter
param.label: Number of rearrangment without improving before stopping (interger, 'auto' or 'all')
